algorithms.imageProcessing

Class HistogramEqualization

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.HistogramEqualization

  • public class HistogramEqualization
extends java.lang.Object
    calculate the transformation function for an image to perform histogram equalization on it, that is change the range of intensities to fill the possible range.
    Author:
    nichole

    • Method Detail

      • applyFilter

        public void applyFilter()
        apply the transformation function to the image to stretch the intensities to use the full range for the color band 0 to 255. Note that a slight difference has been applied with standard equation. The standard scales all values > 0 to between 0 and 255. This scales all values > 0 to between 1 and 255 so a count remains significant and a 0 remains a zero.

      • calculateHistogram

        protected void calculateHistogram()

      • calculateCumulativeHistogram

        protected void calculateCumulativeHistogram()

      • applyTransformationFunction

        protected void applyTransformationFunction()
        apply the transformation function. Note that a slight difference has been applied with standard equation. The standard scales all values > 0 to between 0 and 255. This scales all values > 0 to between 1 and 255 so a count remains significant and a 0 remains a zero.

        return the values for the histogram
